workflows.name: Glean probe-scraper
workflows.display_title: Menu refactoring + Privacy/DNS dialog - VPN-3584 & VPN-3016 (#5729)

head_commit.message:
Menu refactoring + Privacy/DNS dialog - VPN-3584 & VPN-3016 (#5729)

* Menu refactoring

* Implement the DNS/Privacy overwrite settings dialog - VPN-3588

* More strings

* Bitmask for dns settings

* DNS provider flag migration

* Fix a linter issue for a missing ID

* Functional tests

* Implement the split-tunneling tutorial for 2.14 and the menu refactoring

* Add custom dns subtitle and minor layout tidy

* Add card to ViewPrivacy

* Final strings updated

* Fix a rebase issue

* Adds ViewPrivacy warning string and fixes UI nit

Co-authored-by: Lesley Norton <lesley@mozilla.com>
